nodes.text: The Utility Ward was the part of Point Nadir that housed all the power generators, gravity controls, and life support systems that kept the shadowport running. It was controlled by the Anjiliac kajidic, but used many Epsis techs to keep it running which effectively gave them control.
Since it was so vital, it was one of the most secure areas in Point Nadir. It was guarded by Epsis mercenaries and Anjiliac clan thugs.
